content: weave in flower part type 1 separated flowers work 1fst in any ch3-space cut the yarn and weave in x 14 times 14 flowers type 2 connected flowers slip_stitch in any double_crochet-space ch2 1fst in the next ch3-space ch2 1sc in the next double_crochet-space ** x 14 times 14 flowers cut the yarn fasten it off and weave in ** 1sc in the next double_crochet-space - instead of double_crochet-space i prefer to make 1sc into the back loop and third loop of the first double_crochet of the next v_stitch so that the flowers will look separated - if you don t like the single_crochet stitch you can use the slip_stitch instead this does not affect the flowers *** depending on your preference you can use the double_crochet chain method or standing double_crochet stitch to create the first double_crochet stitch of each round/flower the number of starting stitches determines the final number of flowers with x starting stitches the coaster will have x flowers by the end above is an instruction for a 14-flower coaster but you can try making x-flower coasters in the same way base part round 1 xdc into magic_ring x round 2 xdc-increase 2x round 3 1dc 1dc-increase x x times 3x round 4 3dc ch1 x x times 3x double_crochet x ch1-space cut the yarn join in the round and weave in green part round 5 start from any ch1-space work 1dc ch3 1dc in each ch1-space x x times x v-stitches or x ch3-space and x double_crochet-space cut the yarn join in the round and weave in flower part type 1 separated flowers work 1fst in any ch3-space cut the yarn and weave in x x times x flowers type 2 connected flowers slip_stitch in any double_crochet-space ch2 1fst in the next ch3-space ch2 1sc in the next double_crochet-space x x times x flowers cut the yarn fasten it off and weave in flower stitch 1 2 3 4 5 6 v f
